info.name: Sage
info.description: Sage background from the Player’s Handbook 2024.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

ul.li: Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) Quarterstaff, Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (history), Parchment (8 sheets), Robe. 8 GP; or (B) 50 GP

description.p: You spent your formative years traveling between manors and monasteries, performing various odd jobs and services in exchange for access to their libraries. You whiled away many a long evening studying books and scrolls, learning the lore of the multiverse—even the rudiments of magic—and your mind yearns for more.

setters.set: Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, Magic Initiate (Wizard) Feat, Arcana and History Skills, Calligrapher’s Supplies
